      • lookupLdapContent

        public AbstractLdapProvider.LdapSearchResult<Map<String,​Set<String>>> lookupLdapContent​(String dn,
                                                                                              String filter,
                                                                                              String[] values)
                                                                                       throws LdapException
        Get LDAP attributes.
        Specified by:
        lookupLdapContent in class AbstractLdapProvider
        Parameters:
        dn - LDAP DN attribute. If @{code null} then searchBase will be used.
        filter - LDAP filter to use. If @{code null} then @{link LDAP_FILTER} will be used.
        values - match these LDAP values
        Returns:
        set of strings describing the user's attributes
        Throws:
        LdapException - LDAP exception
